g.text: The Comprehensive Anti-Spam Service checks the reputation of the Sneding IP server in real time. The SonicWall Capture Threat Network receives real-time inputs from over 4 million endpoints worldwide to determine the reputation of server that is sending email. Up to 80% of junk email can be dropped at the connection level, thus reducing overall processing by the firewall. The remaining email is processed using the cloud-based SonicWall Capture Threat Network which applies SonicWallâ€™s proven spam detection techniques.
